actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: To convert certain temporary judgeships to permanent judgeships, extend a judgeship, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Converts existing temporary judgeships for the eastern district of California, the central district of Illinois, the northern district of New York, and the eastern district of Virginia to permanent judgeships.Extends a temporary judgeship for the northern district of Ohio.

titles.title: To convert certain temporary judgeships to permanent judgeships, extend a judgeship, and for other purposes.
